messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 58
messages.msgSnippet: This is not my post, it was accidentally sent to me instead of the list (I m assuming). So this is actually from Holly: Marie  wrote: ... we are
messages.messageBody:
This is not my post, it was accidentally sent to me instead of the list (I'm assuming). So this is actually from Holly:

Marie <jmdowis@w...> wrote:
...> we are basically supported(no one knows we are unschooling
though, they
> think we do "sit down work" but I still believe we wouldn't lose

any friends
> over it)

Just curious to know why, if you feel your family and friends would
be supportive, you haven't let them know about your unschooling?

Holly
2 COOL 4 SCHOOL T-shirts
New colors. New products. New designs.
http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school


Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/

messages.subject: Louisiana...was...Re: Digest Number 58
messages.msgSnippet: I m in southern California  (Huntington Beach) but I lived in Shreveport many moons ago.....spent my last few years of high school and 1st few years of college
messages.messageBody:
I'm in southern California (Huntington Beach) but I lived in
Shreveport many moons ago.....spent my last few years of high school
and 1st few years of college there. Moved to CA after that.
Originally from Michigan...by way of New York, Florida, Louisiana
and now CA.

Wendy

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 58
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/27/2004 12:47:21 AM Central Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: Where in Loooooosiana are you from???? I m actually
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/27/2004 12:47:21 AM Central Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
Where in Loooooosiana are you from????
I'm actually from N.C. but moved to New Orleans in '90. Lived uptown after
dh and I were married, then bought 3 acres across the lake (Ponchatrain) after
Emma was born. We now live near a small lakeside town with a library, post
ofc, IGA, shrimp/crab stand, snowball stand...and several restaurants, called
Lacombe. Where are you??
~Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
